Package Utils

Class AlertUtil

java.lang.Object
Utils.AlertUtil
public class AlertUtil extends Object
Class for showing Warning Dialogs to the user

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AlertUtil()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    appointmentOverlapWarning()
    Displays when the user attempts to create or modify an appointment to exist on a time that overlaps with another already existing appointment in the database.
    static void
    appointmentSelectWarningDelete()
    Displays when the user has clicked the Delete button underneath the Appointments table, but has not clicked an appointment to delete from that table.
    static void
    appointmentSelectWarningModify()
    Displays when the user has clicked the Modify button underneath the Appointments table, but has not clicked an appointment to modify from that table.
    static void
    customerSelectWarningDelete()
    Displays when the user has clicked the delete button underneath the Customer table, but has not selected a Customer to delete from that table.
    static void
    customerSelectWarningModify()
    Displays when the user has clicked the modify button underneath the customer table, but has not selected a Customer to modify from that table.
    static void
    officeHoursWarning()
    Displays when the user selects a date for Appointment creation or modification that is outside office hours
    static void
    warning(String title, String header, String content)
    Creates and displays a warning dialog with strings of your choice.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlertUtil

      public AlertUtil()

  • Method Details

    • warning

      public static void warning(String title, String header, String content)
      Creates and displays a warning dialog with strings of your choice. Will remain visible until the user clicks OK
      Parameters:
      title - - title bar string
      header - - header string
      content - - content string. This is usually a detailed error message.

    • officeHoursWarning

      public static void officeHoursWarning()
      Displays when the user selects a date for Appointment creation or modification that is outside office hours

    • appointmentOverlapWarning

      public static void appointmentOverlapWarning()
      Displays when the user attempts to create or modify an appointment to exist on a time that overlaps with another already existing appointment in the database.

    • customerSelectWarningModify

      public static void customerSelectWarningModify()
      Displays when the user has clicked the modify button underneath the customer table, but has not selected a Customer to modify from that table.

    • customerSelectWarningDelete

      public static void customerSelectWarningDelete()
      Displays when the user has clicked the delete button underneath the Customer table, but has not selected a Customer to delete from that table.

    • appointmentSelectWarningModify

      public static void appointmentSelectWarningModify()
      Displays when the user has clicked the Modify button underneath the Appointments table, but has not clicked an appointment to modify from that table.

    • appointmentSelectWarningDelete

      public static void appointmentSelectWarningDelete()
      Displays when the user has clicked the Delete button underneath the Appointments table, but has not clicked an appointment to delete from that table.
